## Summary

Add comprehensive pipeline metrics tracking with trend visualization and threshold-based visual alerts.

### New Features
- **Failure Rate Trending** - Line charts showing main branch failure rate over time with 15% warning threshold
- **Build Duration Trending** - Line charts showing average build duration over time  
- **Code Coverage Trending** - Line charts with 80% target threshold line
- **Visual Flagging** - Alert badges on projects exceeding thresholds:
  - High failure rate \(>15% warning, >25% danger\)
  - Low coverage \(<80%\)
- **Configurable Time Windows** - Uses existing timeframe setting \(7/30/90/180 days\)

### New Files
| File | Purpose |

| `src/components/TrendChart.tsx` | Reusable Chart.js line chart with threshold support |
| `src/components/MetricsPanel.tsx` | Aggregate trend grid for SummarySection |
| `src/components/ProjectMetricsTrends.tsx` | Detailed per-project trend charts |
| `src/components/MetricAlert.tsx` | Visual flagging badges |
| CSS files for each component |
